mapper.insert: insert into pr_detail (pr_num, pr_name, pr_price, pr_issale, pr_mainimg, pr_contentimg, pr_thumb,pr_categoryl, pr_categorys, pr_season) values (#{pr_num},#{pr_name},#{pr_price},#{pr_issale},#{pr_mainimg},#{pr_contentimg},#{pr_thumb},#{pr_categoryl}, #{pr_categorys},#{pr_season})
mapper.select: select pro_num, pro_colorImg, pro_color, pro_size, pro_stock, pro_sales from product where pr_num=#{pr_num}
mapper.insert: insert into client(cl_num, cl_name, cl_price, cl_amount) values (client_seq.nextval,#{cl_name},#{cl_price},#{cl_amount})
mapper.update: update pr_detail pd set pr_sales =(select sum(pro_sales) from product pr where pr.pr_num = pd.pr_num) where pr_num=#{pr_num}
update pr_detail pd set pr_issale ='N' where (select sum(pro_stock) from product pr where pr.pr_num = pd.pr_num)=0
update product set pr_sales =#{cl_amount} where pro_num=#{pro_num}
update product set pr_categoryl=#{pr_categoryl}, pr_categorys=#{pr_categorys}, pr_season=#{pr_season}, pr_price=#{pr_price} where pr_num = #{pr_num}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL((select 1 from pr_detail where pr_num = #{pr_num}), 0) as state from dual
